title: About me
text:
Hi, I’m Hidde! I’m a Master’s student at Utrecht University, where I study Methodology and Statistics for the Behavioural, Biomedical and Social Sciences. Currently I’m writing my Thesis on the performance of Information Criteria and Internal validation techniques in a simulated setting. I’m also a Teaching Assistant in Statistics at Utrecht University and the UMC Utrecht. I’m interested in Bayesian statistics, causal inference, and machine learning.
I’m also a big fan of the R programming language and the tidyverse ecosystem.


Utrecht University | the Netherlands

Utrecht University | the Netherlands
